text:
So it turns out that it's Jared Kushner and two of his friends that are on his coronavirus task force all invested at one point in Oscar Health, the startup founded and run by Kushner's brother. 

This is exactly why we have conflict of interest laws.
https://t.co/oGHYZvXLMs
